data.partBlankContent: Teachers are able to bring the world to their students. They m__ enhance th___ lessons b_ taking stud____ on vir____ field tr___, atte_____ concerts o_ lectures when____ it fi__ their les___ plans. Students may access iTunes U as a reference source or study a concept more in depth.
data.fullContent: Teachers are able to bring the world to their students. They may enhance their lessons by taking students on virtual field trips, attending concerts or lectures whenever it fits their lesson plans. Students may access iTunes U as a reference source or study a concept more in depth.
data.answer: 教师能够把世界带给他们的学生。他们可以通过带学生进行虚拟的实地旅行、听音乐会或讲座来提高他们的课程，只要符合他们的课程计划。学生可以访问iTunes U作为参考资源或更深入地学习一个概念。
